title: Telecom Merger: EU's Breton urges rethink on cross-border telecoms mergers, ET BrandEquity
description: Telecom Merger: EU antitrust chief Margrethe Vestager has been reluctant to allow telecoms providers acquire EU peers without hefty remedies, especially when deals reduce the number of players from four to three, underlining concerns about the market power of fewer but larger telecoms operators. "I believe that creating a true single market for telecommunications services also requires a reflection on encouraging cross-border consolidation, all while preserving fair and necessary competition for the benefit of our consumers," Breton said in a speech to be delivered at an event in Helsinki.
